comments.content:
this is a sign painted outside my father's army station in Germany in 1958

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035448im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Hohenstadt%20Radio%20Station%201955_4726.jpg)

As you said, painted so not-a-font. Can't say it could considered as close but you may like some of the digitizations of [De Vinne](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035448/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/de+vinne) (Grand Central, Denver, Romana, Publication...). May having a look to [Nick Curtis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035448/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Nicks_Fonts) and [Jeff Levine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035448/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Jeff_Levine)'s collections, they have both digitized many signage letterings.
Engravers MT is the font that is on that sign.
